name: n-MYC Amplification
title: n-MYC Amplification
notes:
**Note 1:** This SSDI is effective for diagnosis years 2024+
* For cases diagnosed 2018-2023, leave this SSDI blank

**Note 2:** n-MYC Amplification is a gene that normally regulates cell growth. Studies have shown that n-MYC amplification is an indicator of poor prognosis and increased risk of unfavorable outcomes in patients with neuroblastoma.
* Primary sources of information: molecular pathology report (may be addendum to original pathology report), CAP Protocol

**Note 3:** Physician statement of n-MYC can be used to code this data item when no other information is available.
footnotes: (1) American Society of Clinical Oncology Â© 2009, The International Neuroblastoma Risk Group (INRG) Classification System: AN INRG Task Force Report; published by American Society of Clinical Oncology, 2009
rows: Test ordered, results not in chart
